Full moon is when the crazy people come out to play!

psfponies <psfponies@...> wrote:            I think your right the full moon can have major effects on peoples moods and actions. 
   
  Kay
   
  

Stefan Bion <yahoogroups@...> wrote:
  Maybe it's just the fullmoon we had two days ago... :-)

-- 

> There must be some awful perturbations in the Force these days. We get 
> three earthquakes in as many days here, then a LOT of the Yahoogroups I'm 
> on break out in discontent and arguing, fighting. Even ones that bear no 
> relation to others at all. Be very aware of that. IT ISN'T JUST HAPPENING 
> HERE. What's going on in the world? Is something really bad about to 
> happen? I'm a little bit scared.

> Zack
